page.title: 14LOCAL INDUSTRY:ST.ALBANS
page.content: {THE QUARRY.}St. Albans Sand and Gravel Co.Ltd. started working sand and gravel from what is now called Coopers Field in 1970. In 1979 S.A.S.A.G. took over the farming care of all the restored land and in 1983 eventually purchased the restored land along with the remainder of Beech Farm. {LACRE.}The history of Lacre is a jumpy one. It started in Long Acre, London as the Long Acre Car Company Ltd. This eventually changed to Lacre. The first car they made was the "L Acre". The present factory was built in St. Albans in 1959.Inside the showroom there are 3 vintage models and 2 modern roadsweepers.{CASE.}This stands for Cash and Security Equipment Ltd. They sell photographic cameras and sorting machines which can count, sort and tell you the value of all 7 British coins.
